interpretation:
The "page with curl" card signifies a new chapter or idea that is just beginning to take shape. It represents a fresh start, and a reminder to be open to new opportunities and perspectives. This card may also indicate the need to pay attention to details and take a thorough approach to any new projects or endeavors. 

Associated keywords include: fresh start, new idea, attention to detail, beginning, opportunity, perspective. 

When this card appears in a reading, it may be encouraging you to embrace change and be open to new experiences. Trust that this new chapter in your life will bring positive growth and opportunities for personal development. Take a careful and thoughtful approach to your endeavors, and be open to feedback and collaboration with others. This card reminds us that even small beginnings can lead to great achievements.
